mapper.select: select rnumwhere.* from ( select rownum rnum,quresult.* from ( select qu.*, users.username, pro.productname from qualitycontrols qu join users on (users.userid = qu.userid) join products pro on (pro.productid = qu.productid) order by qu.qualitycontroltime desc ) quresult ) rnumwhere where rnum >= #{indexStart} and rnum <= #{indexEnd}
mapper.insert: insert into qualitycontrols ( qualitycontrolid, productid, performanceid, userid, result, failreason, comments, qualitycontroltime, passpack, failpack ) values ( SEQ_QUALITYCONTROLS.nextval, #{productid}, #{performanceid}, #{userid}, #{result}, #{failreason}, #{comments}, TO_DATE(#{qualitycontroltime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'), #{passpack}, #{failpack} )
